projects.mainTitle: Wastewater Flow Monitoring; In-situ Rehabilitation – Town of Parachute
mainContent: WestWater Engineering conducted flow monitoring of the Town’s total effluent to verify volumes being charged by Battlement Mesa and also characterize infiltration flows and complete a cost effective analysis of reducing infiltration in order to prioritize system repairs.
WestWater Engineering also completed Plans and Specifications for in-situ sewer line repairs to reduce infiltration flows and monthly user charges.
